poemsDataJson.list_full: 忘(わす)れじの 行(ゆ)く末(すゑ)までは かたければ 今日(けふ)を限(かぎ)りの 命(いのち)ともがな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If remembering me//Will for him in future years//Be too difficult,//It would be well this very day//That I should end my life.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Wasureji no|Yuku-sue made wa|Katakereba|Kyō o kagiri no|Inochi to mogana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: けふをかきりの いのちともかな
poemsDataJson.author: 儀同三司母(ぎどうさんしのはは)
poemsDataJson.author_en: The Mother of//Fujiwara no Korechika, Lady Kishi
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 幸福の絶頂において死んでしまいたいという女心
